1.title: The Day the Homestead Almost Died

episode of.title: Alaska: The Last Frontier - Exposed (TV Series 2013– )

1.plot: With insider facts and Frontier Extras, The Kilchers kick off a complete homestead overhaul. When blindsided by a massive snowstorm, the family uses every piece of heavy machinery in their arsenal to ensure their survival.

2.title: The Day the Ice Road Shattered

episode of.title: Alaska: The Last Frontier - Exposed (TV Series 2013– )

2.plot: With insider facts and Frontier Extras - The family works together to rescue and repair a broken down tractor before the ice road melts. Otto puts his safety on the line when everyone pitches in to build log tracks across the frozen river.

3.title: The Day the Homestead Caught Fire

episode of.title: Alaska: The Last Frontier - Exposed (TV Series 2013– )

3.plot: With insider facts and Frontier Extras - Otto makes some radical changes after a chimney fire threatens to destroy his cabin. Then, Atz Lee and Jane embark on an ice fishing mission only to find themselves on thin ice.

4.title: The Day the Cattle Swam

episode of.title: Alaska: The Last Frontier - Exposed (TV Series 2013– )

4.plot: With insider facts and Frontier Extras - Otto and Eivin prepare the barge to move wild buffalo. Jane and Charlotte lead the Kilchers' first ever all-female cattle drive. Then, Atz Sr. and Atz Lee protect a homestead relic.

5.title: The Day the Buffalo Broke Free

episode of.title: Alaska: The Last Frontier - Exposed (TV Series 2013– )

5.plot: With insider facts and Frontier Extras - Tensions flare when Otto and Jane journey to Kodiak Island to rescue a herd of wild buffalo. Then, Atz Sr. and Atz Lee help Shane build his cabin while Eivin and Eve tackle an urgent roof repair.

6.title: Buffalo 2, Cowboys 0

episode of.title: Alaska: The Last Frontier - Exposed (TV Series 2013– )

6.plot: With insider facts and Frontier Extras - Atz Sr. ventures into the Alaskan backcountry to hunt black bear. Otto and Jane continue their mission to relocate a herd of wild buffalo. Atz Lee and Nikos test their shooting skills.

7.title: The Day the Glacier Fell

episode of.title: Alaska: The Last Frontier - Exposed (TV Series 2013– )

7.plot: With insider facts and Frontier Extras - A shrimping trip takes a dangerous turn when Otto, Eivin and August try to outrun a crumbling glacier. Then, Atz Lee and Charlotte rush to save a cow's life while Eve and Jane fish for salmon.

8.title: The Day Thanksgiving Went Mobile

episode of.title: Alaska: The Last Frontier - Exposed (TV Series 2013– )

8.plot: With insider facts and Frontier Extras - The Kilcher Thanksgiving feast goes mobile this year. Hop aboard the family's flatbed truck as they tour the homestead's many upgrades, play holiday games, and give thanks to friends and family.

9.title: The Day the Crane Collapsed

episode of.title: Alaska: The Last Frontier - Exposed (TV Series 2013– )

9.plot: With insider facts and Frontier Extras - Atz Lee and Jane go kayak fishing, but reel in more than they bargained for. Eivin, Eve and Charlotte race against the tide to rescue a weak cow.

10.title: The Day Jewel Returned

episode of.title: Alaska: The Last Frontier - Exposed (TV Series 2013– )

10.plot: With insider facts and exclusive Mega Moments - Jewel returns to the homestead for son Kase's first cattle drive. Shane faces an uncertain future with his home build.

11.title: The Day of Triumph & Tragedy

episode of.title: Alaska: The Last Frontier - Exposed (TV Series 2013– )

11.plot: With insider facts and Frontier Extras - The Kilchers take on some of the biggest jobs in homestead history. Otto and Eivin relocate the historic Octagon Cabin while Shane, Atz Lee and Jane rush to finish Shane's cabin.

12.title: The Day Santa Came to the Homestead

episode of.title: Alaska: The Last Frontier - Exposed (TV Series 2013– )

12.plot: With insider facts and Frontier Extras - It's Christmastime on the homestead. The family plays Secret Santa and someone gets a lump of coal. Atz Lee makes art with fire, Eivin tries to avoid blowing himself up.

14.title: Winter is Coming

episode of.title: Alaska: The Last Frontier - Exposed (TV Series 2013– )

14.plot: With insider facts and Frontier Extras - Frigid temperatures sweep into southern Alaska and the Kilchers need to get jobs done before the first freeze. Otto and Eivin go on a salvage hunt.

15.title: Hunting Season Begins

episode of.title: Alaska: The Last Frontier - Exposed (TV Series 2013– )

15.plot: With insider facts and Frontier Extras - Eve butchers chickens with her children to teach them about the cycle of life. Eivin builds a shelter for his trusty horse. Atz Lee and Jane warm up their remote cabin. Atz Sr. goes on a solo hunt.

18.title: To Live and Die in AK

episode of.title: Alaska: The Last Frontier - Exposed (TV Series 2013– )

18.plot: With insider facts and Frontier Extras - In this special episode, the Kilchers answer viewer questions about the ups and downs of life on the homestead over the last six years.

19.title: Homesteading: The Next Generation

episode of.title: Alaska: The Last Frontier - Exposed (TV Series 2013– )

19.plot: With added facts and Frontier Extras - Yule Kilcher's legacy has survived for generations due to the commitment of his family and a community of fellow homesteaders. Now, a new generation of young homesteaders must carry the torch.

8.title: The Prodigal Daughter Returns

episode of.title: Alaska: The Last Frontier - Exposed (TV Series 2013– )

8.plot: With insider facts, bonus footage and Homestead Hacks - Atz Sr.'s daughter, singer-songwriter Jewel, returns to the homestead for the first time in years. She brings her son, Kase, for his first Alaskan visit.

11.title: Chopper Rescue

episode of.title: Alaska: The Last Frontier - Exposed (TV Series 2013– )

11.plot: With insider facts, bonus footage and Homestead Hacks - Otto recruits a big team and helicopter to move his 6,000-lb high tunnel greenhouse. Eve learns how to set-net to stock up on fish for the winter and Atz Sr. trains a new foal.

12.title: Homesteading for the Holidays

episode of.title: Alaska: The Last Frontier - Exposed (TV Series 2013– )

12.plot: With insider facts and Frontier Extras - The Kilchers celebrate their most unforgettable Christmas ever with a unique gift exchange. They use their Kilcher ingenuity to make homemade gifts.

13.title: Bracing for Change

episode of.title: Alaska: The Last Frontier - Exposed (TV Series 2013– )

13.plot: With insider facts and Frontier Extras - Fall brings big changes to the homestead. Tensions flare between Otto and August in their last mission before August leaves for college. Walls go up on Atz Lee's new cabin.

15.title: Gold Rush

episode of.title: Alaska: The Last Frontier - Exposed (TV Series 2013– )

15.plot: With insider facts and Frontier Extras - Otto pays for his hernia surgery and ends up with gold fever. Jane and Eivin hunt for enough deer meat to last the winter.

16.title: Hunting Season

episode of.title: Alaska: The Last Frontier - Exposed (TV Series 2013– )

16.plot: With insider facts and Frontier Extras - Atz Lee, having recuperated from his fall, tests himself alone in the wilderness. Atz and Nikos travel far from home to find food. Plus, Eivin builds a boat to secure his family's future.

18.title: Blood is Thicker than Winter

episode of.title: Alaska: The Last Frontier - Exposed (TV Series 2013– )

18.plot: With insider facts and Frontier Extras - Each day presents new conflicts for the Kilchers and their life on the homestead. With unseen footage and fan questions, they show us how to survive the Alaskan wilderness and each other.
